entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a distorted reflection and being covered in blood. He is also mentioned as being very conscious of others listening in.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as goggling at Harry's face along with everyone else.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as raising her wand and siphoning off the dried blood from Harry's face.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being one of the people listening in on Harry's conversation.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being one of the people listening in on Harry's conversation.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as being one of the people listening in on Harry's conversation.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as being one of the people listening in on Harry's conversation.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is described as floating along the bench to eavesdrop on Harry's conversation.

relationships.description: Hermione helps Harry by siphoning off the dried blood from his face.
Harry is spotted by Ron and Hermione.
Hermione helps Harry by siphoning off the dried blood from his face.
